SamPy.db.MSdata.MillenniumData¶

class SamPy.db.MSdata.MillenniumData(sql)¶

This class was designed to fetch data from the Millennium Simulation database. Input for the constructor is SQL query to be performed. Syntax must be valid SQL.

__init__(sql)¶
